De curacio de anca dislocada.	Treatment of a dislocated hip.
Sapias que la junctura del ancha e la junctura del muscle no endeve sino dislocacio tant solament, e no accideys ad aquelas aquo que accideys a las autras juncturas de petita remocio e concavitat.	It should be known that the joint of the shoulder and the joint of the muscle do not only result in dislocation but also lead to conditions such as inflammamoins, ligament tears, tendonitis or other injuries caused by minor movements and deformations. Other factors can cause similar issues at different joints with slight mobility changes and concavities.
E la junctura de la ancha es dislocada segon quatre manieyras, quar es dislocada a las partidas dedintz, o a las partidas defora, o a las partidas denant, o a las partidas detras.	The fracture is displaced according to four directions; it can be displaced towards the inside (medial), outside (lateral), in front of or forward (anteriorly), or behind or backward (posteriorly).
E majorment es dislocada a las partidas dedintz, e pauc a las partidas denant o a las partidas detras.	The majority of it is displaired to the front parts, and little to the back or side parts.
E senhal de la dislocacio de lu a las partidas de dintz es quar, quan tu ajustas la camba del malaute sana am la malaute, es pus longua e·l denolh es pus heminent que de la sana, e·l malaute no pot doblar le sieu pe deves le lenguonar, e es le loc que siec le lengonar apostemat de apostema caut, per so que·l cap de la coyssa ja es pervengut aqui.	Sign of the displacement from the left to the right sides is four, when you adjust the sick bed towards the healthier side, it becomes longer and more prominent than that of the sane, and the illness cannot double its pace; instead, it must be spoken through your words. And it is the place where one should administer the ointment of healing balm for swelling caused by inflammamoines, so that the head of this affair has arrived here.
E·l senhal de aquel al qual accideys dislocacio es a las partidas defora, es que les accidentz de lu so contraris ad aquest accident.	The sign of that which causes displacement to the parts outside is that its effects contradict this incident.
E senhal de aquel al qual accideys dislocacio a las partidas denant es quar expan la camba sieua segon compliment, mays empero no dobla aquela ses dolor que es en le denol, e si se perforsa ad anar e no pot sobre aquo a las partidas denant; e la urina de lu es retenguda e l’engonar de lu es apostemat, e deves la ambulacio de lu sobre le talo.	In the sign of the man to whom dislocation occurs at the fore limbs beyond his reach according to the standard complement, but not exceeding that pain which is in the hindquarters; and if he proceeds on foot and cannot go towards the fore limbs; his urine is retained and his gait is lame, so you must walk him on level ground.
E senhal de aquel al qual accideys dislocacio a las partidas detras es que no expande le denol, ni no puesca doblar aquel denant que doble le engonar, e la camba de lu es pus breva que l’autra, e l’engonar es mollificat, e·l cap de la coyssa es deves aquel loc.	Sign of the tree to which a dislocation occurs in its parts behind is that it does not expand at the knot, nor pulls up to bend that branch twice as much, and the cambium on one side is more swolpress than the other, and the collar is softened, and the top of the trunk is towards that location.
Mays reduccio de las specias de aquesta dislocacio es que tu consideras, lahoras, si la dislocacio es vetusta et antiqua, que ja es anticada am le havent aquela aprop tu aministras reduccio de lu e roman segon la sua disposicio, lahoras no es en aquela curacio de tot; e adonc no cove que en aquela sia fayta prosompcio.	The reduction of spices in this displacement is that you consider, at times, if the displacement is old and ancient, which has already become outdated according to your administration's policy on reductions, then it is not necessary for there to be a compensation in that situation; therefore, no need to make any further adjustments.
Mays en aquel del qual la dislocacio es recent, e es una de las quatre specias de dislocacio, lahoras te coyta ad aquo que volvas la junctura e extendas aquela a las partidas dedintz e a las partidas defora, e mau aquela a la dextra e sinistra, quar fort leu retorna e no indigeys de autra cura.	In the case of recent dislocation, which is one of the four types of dislocations, you should return to the joint position and gently extend it towards both inner and outer parts as well as right and left sides; do not delay in doing so.
Mays, si no retorna en aquesta manieyra, lahoras cove que tu prepares ministre fort e extendas la camba de lu de la partida pus dejos, o am las suas mas, o am liament lo qual es liat sobre la camba desus le denol; e autre ministre extenda la ma de aquel desus enayssi que meta las suas mas dejos les titillics de lu; e aprop strenha am liament leon sobre la razit de la coyssa, e tengua autre ministre ters le extremitat del liament.	If Mays does not return in this manner, the hours he has prepared shall bring forth and extend the chain of light from the departure side, or on his own behalf, or with his hand, lay over the chain above the designated spot; another minister shall extend the same chain as far as his shadow falls upon it; and yet a third person shall bind by the leash to the rope of the cause, holding firmly at its extremity.
E sia extencio de lu o de la partida dedintz a l’angonar a la partida de la furcula, o de la partida detras a la partida del dos.	C is the extension of line o from the vertex to the opposite side in the triangle or from the vertex behind to the other side of the triangle.
E sia la extencio de totz aquels en una veguada entro que·l malaute sia elevat am le sieu cos de terra e que romangua pendent.	E is the extension of all those in a district where the malaria incidence is high and they suffer from its effects on their health.
E aquesta specia de extencio es specia cominal a totas quatre.	This type of extension is particularly common to all four.
E donc si la dislocacio retorna am aquo que havem dit, sira bo; e sino, lahoras es necessari a tota specia aquo que dire de la propria curacio.	If the displacement returns what we have said, then it is true; otherwise, hours are necessary for the entire water that you speak of regarding one's own injury.
En la reduccio de lu propria, quan es dislocada, e la dislocacio es a las partidas dedintz, cove que·l malaute sia ressupinat sobre le sieu latz sa; e aprop pausa les liamentz sobre la razit de la coyssa en aquel loc le qual entre le cap de la coyssa e·l loc que es dejos le langonar; e aprop exten le liament en sus de la part del angonar a la pus auta partida de la furcula.	In the reduction of its own, when it is dislocated and the displacement occurs in frontal directions, causing that pain to be projected over its left side; and as well pushes the limbs upwards from the root of the clavicle to where it extends on this location between the head of the clavicle and the place which lies behind the neck; and furthermore expands outward towards the front part of the scapula.
E aprop autre ministre fort prengua les brasses de lu, e amerme le loc gros de la coyssa malaute e extenda a las partidas deforo per extencio vehement, quar aquela retorna en le sieu loc.	Another minister took hold of the matter seriously and extended his efforts to various departments in order to address the issue effectively. Soon enough, the situation returned to its original location.
E aquesta specia es de pus leugiera curacio am la qual aquest membre es reduzit que las autres specias.	This is a particularly light therapy for the condition in which the affected member is reduced compared to other treatments.
Mays si es excusat sobre tu e no obezeys al entrament am aquesta specia de curacio de tot, lahoras cove que sian liatz les dos pes del malaute ensemps am liament fort, leugier, sobre amdos les talos e amdos les denols.	Mays, I excuse myself for not adhering to this form of curative therapy in its entirety. However, it is crucial that both parties receive the necessary treatment at the same time during these periods when the two weights of illness are combined together with love and trust on both sides - through words and actions alike.
E sia la longitut de quascun de son par la quantitat de quatre ditz, e sia la camba malaute extenduda mays que l’autre per quantitat de dos ditz.	Let E be the length of each segment being four times their quantity, and let the bad curvature extended more than the other by a difference of two units in length.
E aprop le malaute sia suspendut sobre le cap del fust, e que sia en la mayso; e sia la longitut de lu de la terra la quantitat de dos brasses.	Apologize for the inconvenience caused to your vessel's hull, and ensure that it is promptly removed; and be of a length equal to twice the height above the ground.
E aprop comanda a un jove fort que minuesca le cap de la coyssa, e sia suspendut am le malaute autre jove, e l’autre jove minuent la coysa am fortaleza empellesca, quar la junctura retorna al sieu loc am velocitat.	The boy was commanded to cut off the head of the cockatrice, and be hanged from it for any other young man who dares challenge him; while the other boy removes the cockatrice's head with great strength, thrusting upwards, causing the jointed creature to return to its original place at a swift speed.
Mays en la reducio propria, quan es dislocacio a la partida defora, cove que·l malaute jaga sobre pug segon que havem recomtat en le havent gelbozitat; e sia strenhut le liament sobre la camba malauta propriament e sobre le pietz de lu.	In Mays, when there is a reduction in its own dislocation and it has shifted too far away, the pain continues to act according to what we have recounted earlier, with swelling around the affected joint itself as well as over the limbs themselves.
E aprop dos fustz sian pausatz, la un als pes de lu, e l’autre al cap; e aprop sian pausatz fustz ajustatz al mieg del pueg ficat sobre·l qual draps humitz sian envolopatz, per so que·l malaute no sia dampnajat per que·l fust sia entre las coyssas de lu, per que deves la extencio a las partidas dejos no sia atirat.	Near the head of the stake, one end should be weighted with lead and the other pointed; and near the top of the stake they should adjust their ropes so that thick cloth surrounds it, to ensure that the evil spirit is not exorcised by its being amidst his possessions, thus you must extend your influence beyond these bounds lest it be provoked.
E aprop quascun ministre extenda a la sua part, e·l metge am la sua ma enguala la reduccio segon l’art.	Every minister is entitled to an equal share, and the physician shall receive his portion accordingly as per the provision of law.
Donc, si obezeys a revercio, sira bo grandament; e sino, pausa sobre aquela diligentment e ayssi quo havem dit en gelbozitat per aquela engualment.	If reversed, it will be great; if not, pause carefully and thus as we have said in conclusion for that agreement.
Mays cove que·l malaute jagua sobre les sieus latz sa quetament.	At Mays Cove, the jaguar quietly lounges over his lair in quiet contemplation.
E quan la dislocacio es a las partidas denant, lahoras cove que la camba sia extenduda leugierament, e es segon aquesta meteyssa narracio sobre pueg; e le metge pause la palma de la sua ma dreyta sobre·l langonar malaute, e aprop coarte aquel am l’autra ma, e am aquela coartacio pausa aquel extendut a las partidas dejos a la partida del denol.	When the dislocation is towards the fingers, hours ago it was known that the bandage should be extended lengthwise; according to this narrative on the puppet, the surgeon places his right palm over the mallet and ties one arm with the other tied member, and then extends that arm towards the fingers previously mentioned at the end of the string.
E si la dislocacio es a las partidas detras, lahoras no cove que·l malaute sia extendut a las partidas dejos, e es elevat sobre la terra; habantz cove que sia pausat sobre causa dura, ayssi cum cove le eyssament si l’ancha de lu es dislocada a las partidas defora, segon aquo que havem dit del jasement de lu sobre dos anchas; e es sobre la sua cara e les liamentz sian extendutz, segon que havem dit, no ha guayre.	If the dislocation is towards the back parts, there should be doubt that the illness extends to the left parts as well, and it is elevated above ground; one may assume it'n to be resting on a hard surface, just as when we said of its extension over two widths (widths referring to the breadth of the patient), so too its face should be extended, according to what has been previously mentioned. There should be no harm in this case.
E cove que sia aministrada compressio am taula sobre le loc al qual yeys la junctura.	A compression table is applied to the site where there are joints.
Donc cum la reducio es complida segon que cove — e·l senhal de la reduccio de lu no es amaguat a tu, e es que tu extendas del malaute doas cambas, e quan tu vezes aquelas enguals e le malaute extrenh la sieua camba e expandeys aquela ses excusacio, lahoras sapias que·l membre segon que cove es retornat — e lahoras tu ajusta doas coyssas e pausa empastre e extrenh am benda ayssi que la ancha no sia mauguda en alcuna de las partidas; e adheresca le malaute a repaus per tres dias o per quatre.	When the reduction is completed according to how you can — and the sign of the reduction does not show on your body, and you extend from those bad habits, and when you touch those scales and make them visible outside the other scale and expand that excuse, then know that the member after which the reduction was made — return it back together with both sides evenly and avoid any unevenness in either part; also adhere to rest for three or four days.
E aprop deslia le liament e l’empastre, e compara la una camba am l’autra.	A prop of the leaning and the flattened, compare the one with the other.
Lahoras, si vezas aquelas enguals en vustament, lahoras sapias que la dislocacio ja es fermada, e adonc layssa le malaute anar.	If you see those people behaving in that manner, remember that the disturbance has already been stopped, so let go of any resentment.
E si vezas alcuna causa de mollificacio, lahoras tu retorna e emplastra aquel, e extrenh aquel segon la tua primiera strectura, e layssa aquel en tres dias.	If there is no sign of improvement after using this remedy, you should return and reapply that plaster as per your initial bandaging, leaving it on for three days.
E aprop deslia aquel, e fay aquel tardar en ambulacio sobre quascu per alcus dias, entro que sia confortat.	After the cast is removed, he may take some time to walk on ashes for nearly two weeks, during which he will be comfortable.

De curacio de dislocacio del denolh.	Treatment of the dislocated shoulder.
Le denolh es dislocat segon tres manieyras, quar es dislocat a las partidas defora, e a las partidas dedintz, e a las partidas dejos mays a las partidas detras; e a las partidas denant no es dislocat.	The verb "desentonar" is conjugated according to three ways, it's detonated in the parts before, and in the parts inside, and in the parts left more than in the parts behind; but not in the front parts.
E le senhal de dislocacio de lu es que comandes al malaute que aplique la sua camba am la coyssa; lahoras sapias que·l denol es dislocat.	The sign of the lunar eclipse is that you command the malady to apply its spell upon the cosmos; then, you shall know when the devil is displaired.
E la restauracio de totas las manieyras de lu es que fassas cezer le malaute dreyt, enayssi que ja extenda la sieua camba, si pot sobre aquo; adherir le tieu dos a la cara de lu, e pausa le pe de lu entre les tieus pes; e aprop fay adherir le denol de lu am las tuas palmas, e rete aquelas entre les tieus ditz sobre le denolh de lu am fortaleza, e autre ministre extenda le sieu pe entro que·l denol retorne a son loc.	The complete ritual of full moon involves you addressing the Moon to alleviate any distress it may be experiencing, only if its influence has already extended over your land and it is within your power; then clasp the back of your hands together in front of you, and pause with palms touching. Then firmly adhere your thumbs against each other on either side of its body. Extend your legs beneath it to provide a stable base as the Moon regains its position. This ritual is believed to bring balance and harmony during this special lunar phase.
E senhal de reddicio de lu es que la sua camba adharesca am la coyssa am levitat no-laboroza.	A sign of divine redirection in life is that your current path may lead you to the house above without any effort on your part.
E aprop emplastra aquel e fay adhirir la camba am la coyssa, e aprop lia aquelas emsemps am una benda per tres dias o per quatre, e aprop deslia aquelas.	Article: The Israelites were commanded to take the two goats and assign one for God (the Lord) while marking the other as belonging to the scapegoat. They then tied each of these marked goats by their hands for three or four days, after which they would release them.
E no uze le malaute de ambulacio per alcus dias, entro que sia sanat e cofortat.	E non usi l'uso della malattia dell'ambulazione per i giorni in cui sei stato curato e confortato.
Mays si la reduccio de lu a tu es excusada, lahoras aministra fort extencio am liamentz dels quals en la curacio de la hancha precedit narracio.	My apologies for the delay in getting back to you; I've been preoccupied with overseeing some extended leave arrangements that were mentioned in the previous case about a spine injury.
Capitol .xxxiii.	Chapter III: The Legislative Branch - Congress and Its Structure
De la curacio de la dislocacio del talo.	Treatment of ankle dislocation
Le talo alcunas veguadas es remaugut per petita remocio, e alcunas veguadas es dislocat segon compliment, e la dislocacio de lu es fayta o a las partidas dedintz o a las partidas deforo.	The small plow turns some plots of land, and other plots are tilled according to design, and the tilling of these is done either within or around individual sections.
E le senhal de la dislocacio de lu es que vezes le talo imflat procedent a la partida a la qual es dislocat.	The hallmark of this type of dislocation is that it occurs as a result of an impact to the side where the flat bone has been displawed from its original position.
Mays la curacio de la remocio de lu es de leugiera reddicio, e es que sia extendut am facilitat am las mas e sia engualhat entro que retorne.	May's cure of the removal process should be a lightly burdensome endeavor and it is to be as accessible as possible for everyone so that it can return smoothly.
Mays en la curacio de lu quan es dislocat segon compliment, cove que fasses cezer le malaute dreyt, e tengua aquel un ministre fort e valent de la partida detras del dos de aquel en le mieg loc de lu.	In the case of a dislocation caused by an injury, it is recommended that you do what's right to alleviate the pain and have someone strong and capable from your team support you in moving the affected area gently.
E aprop te tu am la tieua ma dreyta le pe de la pus sobirana part, e am la tua ma sinistra de la part pus dejos del pe en le loc de la cavilha.	Bend down your right hand and place it on the top of the highest sacred object; then place your left hand to the immediate right side (your) of that, at the location of the knob or handle.
E aprop atira le pe a tu am la tua ma dreyta, e aprop am la sinistra per dos veguadas, e aprop exten am la sinistra; e empelleys le pietz del pe am la dreyta deves la camba ses trebalh.	Aim the arrow at your target, then draw back with your right hand, and extend it forward; shoot by releving the string of your right arm's bow to make three attempts.
E fay aquo doas veguadas segon que havem comtat.	"E àgua dosso-se dividiu segundo a contagem, the water split according to the count." (Portuguese)
E aprop empelleys le pietz del pe a la camba la tersa veguada, e tu es a la cavilha.	C is pushing the pieces to the third chessboard and you are in checkmate.
Donc si retorna en una veguada o en dos segon aquesta manieyra, e si vezes le pe engualhat, es bo; e sino, lahoras sobre lu itera la operacio, quar aquel retorna.	If an item is found in the first or second array based on this method and you find its pair, it's good; if not, repeat the operation for the hour as many times as necessary until that item returns.
Mays si a tu es prohibida la reduccio de lu am aquo que havem recomtat, lahoras fay jaser le malaute sobre le sieu dos sobre terra, e estrenh un paysel mot en terra fermat, e que caja entre las coyssas de lu, e tu ja has envolopat sobre lu drap per so que no ledesca le malaute.	Mays si te es prohibido reducir l'agua che avem recomandà, allora fai un male uso del tuo tempo sulla terra, e non inizi nessun nuovo progetto qui su la Terra, e che questo faccia parte delle cose di lui. Inoltre, ti sei già ripiegato sopra di lui con quel telo per evitare il malocchio.
E aprop le ministre de lu tengua las suas coyssas, e aprop autre ministre extenda le pe am las suas mas o am liament que lie sobre le col del pe; e aprop extenda aquel quascun ministre contre extencio del sieu par, e le payssel sia extant entre las coyssas del malaute retinent aquel, per so que·l cos de lu no sia atirat a las partidas dejos deves la sua extencio.	Article I - The ministers of each language shall submit their claims to the Minister for Languages within one month from the date of this Agreement; and within two months thereafter, each Minister shall extend his hand (or equivalent gesture) over the head of the other as a sign of friendship and goodwill. Furthermore, each Minister shall extend a line between themselves corresponding to the length of their respective claims.
E aprop le metge enguala la dislocacio am las sieuas mas, e autre ministre tengua la coyssa sana a las partidas dejos, quar la dislocacio retorna am la facilitat.	A) The orthopedist relocates the displacement in their own limbs and another minister restores the health of the remaining parties as displacement returns easily.
E donc cum retorna la dislocacio e es declarada a tu la sanetat de la reduccio de lu, lahoras pausa emplastre e extrenh aquela am liamentz fortment, e ligua le pe am liament a la camba.	So let it return the displacement and be declared to you as the sanity of the reduction of its light hours, with an added pause and stretching that strengthens those limbs greatly, and link up with your ally in trade.
E cove que temes o te guardes dels nervis les quals so detras sobre le talo, per que le liament sobre aquel no sia vehement e leda aquel fortment.	I pray to the angels who protect you from behind the nerves which lie beneath your scalp, that the hair upon it may not fall out vigorently and woefully.
E aprop layssa aquel per dos dias o per tres; e si le liament es mollificat, extrenh aquel.	A propria asserzione afferma che dovrebbe essere rimossa entro due gioramo tre giorni; e se il lamento è ammollito, estratti quel.
E aprop deslia aquel en le ters dia o en le quart, e prohibeys le malaute de anament per xl dias.	On the following day or in four days, and forbids any evil intent towards immigration for forty days.
Mays si es forsat de anar denant aquel spazi, no es fayta segurtat que la dislocacio no sia sobre lu dissolvuda e corrumpuda, e aprop aquo que no recipia curacio.	Mays lest go to that place, he does not make sure that the displacement is not overly dissolved and corrupted, and also ensures that it does not contain any harmful substances.
E si accideys a lu apostema caut, lahoras cove que tu aministre en la cedacio de lu aquo en lo qual precedic la nostra narracio, en autre loc de curacio e de embrocacio, entro que sia remauguda.	E decided to have the abscess lanced, a few hours later he knew that you were treating it in the clinic where our story began, at another location for treatment and embroidery, before which it was successful.
Capitol .xxxiiii.	Chapter 24 - The Continuing Conflict
De curacio de dislocacio dels ditz dels pes.	The treatment of the displacement of the bones in the leg.
Cove que aquel qu’es dislocat sia engualhat am pauca extencio ses trebal; e aquo que no es dificil, abantz es leugier.	That which is deemed difficult often involves little extension of work; and that which is not so challenging tends to be considered more deceitful.
Mays si la dislocacio es en alcus nozes del dos del pe, lahoras cove que fassas cezer le malaute le sieu pe sobre loc engual de la terra o sobre taula, e sia estant ayssi cum si anava.	If your dislocation is in the acromion of both shoulders, it will cause you great pain on the top part of your back or over a table, and so intense that it feels like when going uphill.
E aprop tu sta de pes, e pausa le tieu pe sobre aquo que imineys de las juncturas, e aprop calca aquel am le tieu pe am vertut entro que retorne, e que vejas aquel ja engualhat e no aparesca en le loc eminencia.	And then to the east of that isle stands your peak above the sea level that you may imagine at the joints, and right on top of that hill lies a tree of great value through which you will return, and see that it is equally matched and not present in the same place.
E aprop pausa dejos le ventre del pe de lu una taula que prengua tot le pe, a la qual sian dos caps, e aprop strenh aquel am strectura decent e ferma per tres dias; e aprop deslia aquel e fay aquel repausar de ambulacio per motz dias, entro que sia estrenhut e de reddicio sia assegurat.	E - It is advisab le pausa of the stomach from all food intake for three days, during which two capsules are taken daily; then a period of rest and ambulation is followed for several days to ensure strengthening and recovery.
Capitol .xxxv.	Chapter 55.
De las specias de dislocacio que sian faytas am plagua o am fractura o am quascuna ensemps.	Among the displacements that would be relevant in case of a fall, fracture, or any other injury, some important ones include:
Quan accideys alcuna causa de aquelas, e tu te perforssas en la curacio de aquela e en la restauracio de lu, motas veguadas succezeys la mort.	He who neglects any cause of those things, and you remain idle in the cure or restoration of them, numerous times death succeeds as a result.
E per aquo no cove que sobre la curacio de lu presuma, sino aquel que es savi en l’art, de lonc uzatge, misericordios e pietados, tardiu, no-ardit ni presomptuos; e que use en le comensament de medicinas que cedan apostemas cautz tant solament, e leyssa le malaute al divinal jutgament, sino ad aquel al qual speras salut de perdicio, am de la malautia alleviacio, e en la qual appareys alcuna speransa.	In the chosen cure that lies over the curative process of your affliction, do not resort to those who lack experience in their craft, are distant and uncaring, hasty or pretentious; rather, seek out one who is skilled, well-versed, merciful, and compassanguous. They should only use medications that provide relief from boils exclusively when necessary, and should guide the ailment towards divine judgment not with presumption but to those whom you hope for healing from severe danger, as an alleviation of illness, where there is at least some glimmer of hope.
E adonc esforsa te tantost far de lu la reduccio en le comensament de la causa, denant que endevengua apostema caut.	Therefore, I will attempt to make a summary of the argument in its initial stages before it becomes infected with logical fallacies.
E adonc si le membre retorna segon que volem, lahoras aministra regiment le qual ceda apostema caut e cura la plagua am aquo que conveneys a lu dels enguentz desiccatius.	Therefore, if the member is to be returned according to our wishes, hours are spent administering the appropriate regimen which prevents infection and treats the wound with water or ointment as necessary.
E si dislocacio es am fractura e accideys en le os satagias separadas, lahoras tu perforsa le stement de lor, e fay en aquo so que havem dit en las malautias simplas de aquo que es precedit en les locz de aquels.	When there is a dislocation or accident causing separate fragments of bone, the person should seek medical attention immediately and follow any instructions given at that time regarding simple illnesses that occurred before in those locations.
E guarda e esquiva segon la tua vertut aquel del intrament en las vias de temor segon que a tu es precedida la mia predicacio; quar aquo es milhor a tu deves le tieu Creator, e mays permanent a la tua gloria, e mays saludos al tieu cos verays aquels en le tieu temps.	E watch and avoid the temptation in your heart according to my previous warning; for it is better for you to serve your Creator, and bring more glory to yourself, along with health to all true things within your time.
Ayssi fineysso las paraulas de Albucasim perfieytament de las quals Dieus ne sia benezeyt.	"May Albuquerque's words be accurately quoted, and may God bless them."
Amen.	Indeed, amen! How may I assist you today?
